org.glassfish.internal.api

Interface JavaEEContextUtil

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JavaEEContextUtilImpl

    @Contract
public interface JavaEEContextUtil
    utility to create / push Java EE thread context
    Author:
    lprimak

    • Method Detail

      • pushContext

        JavaEEContextUtil.Context pushContext()
        pushes Java EE invocation context
        Returns:
        old ClassLoader, or null if no invocation has been created

      • pushRequestContext

        JavaEEContextUtil.RequestContext pushRequestContext()
        pushes invocation context onto the stack Also creates Request scope
        Returns:
        new context that was created

      • getApplicationName

        String getApplicationName()
        Returns:
        application name or null if there is no invocation context

      • setApplicationContext

        set context class loader by appName
        Parameters:
        appName -

      • getInvocationClassLoader

        ClassLoader getInvocationClassLoader()
        Returns:
        Class Loader that's associated with current invocation or null if there is no current invocation
